title: Office space design 01
description: This package includes high quality models for your Office. Render-ready devices for animation and VR
longDescription:
Preface:

  • This model is optimized for Unreal Engine 5
  • PBR material for Lumen. Be sure to turn on Virtual Textures for both the Opacity Mask to display the fire material and the translucent curtain material.
  • Compatible with Path-Tracing with some minor material changes
  • Visit my store to see more products for Unreal Engine
  • My website


Features:

  • Quad-based mesh with attention to detail such as welds, stitching, and wrinkles.
  • PBR materials created in Substance Painter, compatible with all major 3D software.
  • Ready for close-up renders or animation with no further editing required.
  • The coordinate axis is located below and at the base of the object

Benefits:

  • We provide ready-to-use files for your preferred 3D software (3ds Max, Cinema4D, SketchUp, Unreal Engine, Blender, etc.).
  • If you are using any 3D application such as: Cinema4D, Sketchup, Unreal Engine, Blender... you just need to contact us and receive the corresponding file.
  • Dedicated customer support with a satisfaction guarantee.
  • Loyalty program with discounts for repeat customers.


Scene details:

-Unit: mm / Texture size: From 2k to 4k

The scene includes the following high-quality assets:

  • 18 office chairs
  • 18 computers, keyboards and mice
  • 35 office books
  • 12 decorative items
  • 10 office supplies
  • 4 lights

  • Best regards !
